data.description:
Immerse yourself in an immersive experience with our VR Simulator, specifically designed for practical learning in electric vehicles. This advanced simulator allows you to discover each component and its operation in detail, providing a deep understanding of the principles of electromobility. Through realistic three-dimensional scenarios, you can safely practice the disconnection of high-voltage batteries, a critical task in the maintenance and repair of these vehicles.

Explore and learn without any risk, as the virtual environment offers a safe platform to perform complex and potentially dangerous procedures. Additionally, the simulator includes a series of challenges and tests that allow you to test your acquired knowledge and skills. With 360ยบ scenarios and virtualized real cars, you will have the opportunity to face real-world situations and problems, thus improving your competence and preparation in the field of electric vehicles.

This simulator is an essential tool for any professional or student who wishes to master the maintenance and repair of electric vehicles, providing a comprehensive and immersive educational experience that effectively combines theory and practice.
